title: Third Law Hub
content:
[!--
Include the theme.
--]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:3law]]

[!--
Hub specific CSS classes
--]

[[module CSS]]
.hub-window {
    border: solid 5px #999999;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.window-discord {
    margin-left: 25%;
    margin-right: 25%;
    padding: 0px;
}
.window-latest {
    margin-left: 12.5%;
    margin-right: 12.5%;
    padding: 0px;
}
.hub-quote-box {
    border: solid 2px #000000;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-left: 12.5%;
    margin-right: 12.5%;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.hub-quote-box p {
    margin-top: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
}
.hub-credit-box {
    border-bottom: solid 2px #000000;
    margin-left: 7.5%;
    margin-right: 7.5%;
}
.hub-box {
    border: solid 5px #999999;
    background:#fffbfe;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.hub-box-collapsible a.collapsible-block-link {
    color: #315B7D;
    font-size: 175%;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Trebuchet, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
}
.window-box {
}
.window-infobox {
}
.window-box-line {
    border-top: solid 2px #000000;
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.window-box-list ul li {
    padding-top: 5px;
    padding-bottom: 5px;
}
.window-box-collapsible a.collapsible-block-link {
    color: #315B7D;
    font-size: 140%;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Trebuchet, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
}
[[/module]]

[!--
Hidden header image for Crom searches.
--]

[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block
name=theme%3A3law/PL_3Law_Logo_2.png
|caption=Scientia potentia est
|width=100%
|align=center]]
[[/div]]

[!--
Pseudo-breadcrumbs (so that it doesn't propagate downchain), and rating module alignment.
--]

[[table style="width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top"]]
[[[Canon Hub]]] >> Third Law Hub
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: right"]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[!--
Discord link box.
--]
[[# discord]]
[[div class="hub-window window-discord"]]
[[=]]
+ [https://discord.gg/EG3DGUcuDM Join our Discord!]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[!--
Latest entries box. Last five or last 60 days, whichever is higher. Taken from the module on GW's author page.
--]

[[# latest]]
[[div class="hub-window window-latest"]]
[[=]]
+ Latest Entries
[[/=]]

[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[smithsonian-irem-expedition|Smithsonian Expeditionary Logs: Irem, City of Pillars]]]** by //DrGrimoire//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[fear-of-sleep|Fear of Sleep]]]** by //TyGently//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[blood-on-the-ice|Blood On The Ice (An Investigative Sports Report)]]]** by //Anorrack//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[lotus-eater-ostara|The Lotus Eater Reviews: Pagan Pub Crawl]]]** by //DrGrimoire//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[lotus-eater-pho|The Lotus Eater Reviews: Pho Vu Lan]]]** by //DrGrimoire//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[art:evocation-v-ritual|Evocation v Ritual]]]** by //Alexander245//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[the-fruit-of-eight-millennia|The Fruit of Eight Millennia]]]** by //TyGently//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[slayer-of-wickedness|SLAYER OF WICKEDNESS]]]** by //Anorrack//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[scp-8660|SCP-8660]]]** by //TyGently//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[to-make-meat-of-clay|To Make Meat of Clay]]]** by //Anorrack//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[king-of-the-dead-breaker-of-chains|King of the Dead, Breaker of Chains]]]** by //Intercedent//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[ptt-1666-gray-templum|PTT-1666-Gray-Templum â€” "Irkalla, House of Dumuzi, the Netherworld"]]]** by //Anorrack//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[with-naught-but-dust-to-eat|With Naught but Dust to Eat]]]** by //TyGently//[[/span]]
[[span style="margin-left: 10%;"]]**[[[to-be-king-in-the-house-of-dust|To be King in the House of Dust]]]** by //Intercedent//[[/span]]

@@ @@
[[/div]]

[!--
Random article box. Not in production yet

[[# random]]
[[div class="hub-box hub-box-collapsible"]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="Random Article" hide="Close Preview" hideLocation="top"]]
[[/=]]

----

[[module ListPages name="eagle-eye" category="*" wrapper="no" separate="no" tags="third-law -hub" limit="1" order="random"]]

[[head]]
[[/head]]

[[body]]

[[<]]
%%content{4}%%
[[/<]]

[[>]]
[[[%%link%%|Continue reading]]]
[[/>]]

[[/body]]

[[foot]]
[[/foot]]
[[/module]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[/div]]
--]

[!--
ListPages include to grab the content for the hub window.
--]

[[module ListPages wrapper="no" separate="no" category="fragment" name="@URL|third-law-hub-hub-*" parent="." limit="@URL|1" order="@URL|name" offset="@URL|0"]]

[[head]]
[[# window]]
[[div class="hub-window"]]
= << [[[/third-law-hub#window|Home]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/1#window|New Readers]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/2#window|Worldbuilding]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/3#window|Standalone]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-series-*/limit/20/order/random#window|Series]]] | _
| [[[/third-law-hub/offset/4#window|Best Of]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/5#window|Chronological]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/6#window|Published]]] |  [[[/third-law-hub/offset/7#window|Collections]]] >>
[[/head]]

[[body]]
[[div class="hub-box"]]
%%content%%
[[/div]]

[[/body]]

[[foot]]
= << [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/0#window|Contribute]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/1#window|Continuity]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/2#window|History]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/3#window|Timeline]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/4#window|Glossary]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/5#window|Groups]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/6#window|Places]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/7#window|People]]] >>
[[/div]]

[[/foot]]

[[/module]]

[!--
Credit box.
--]
[[# credits]]
[[div class="hub-box hub-box-collapsible window-box-list"]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="Credits" hide="Close Credits" hideLocation="top"]]
[[/=]]
